SUB_W06_WRLD_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_WRLD_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Okay, so this place is disgusting.
The ground is all squishy, and the
walls are pulsating or something?
It's like I'm in a gigantic body. Man, there really are some weird
worlds conjoined to the Lost Realms.

SUB_W06_WRLD_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_WRLD_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I sure hope my kitty isn't getting
chewed up or digested or something.
I'd better find it, and fast!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_SCAN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hm? Looks like a winding path.
Let's check it out!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Blurp! There it is! The foreign body that's
thrown the entire Kosmos into turmoil!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I'm not throwing stuff into turmoil!
I'm just looking for my cat.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't play dumb with me! You are clearly
a foreign body, and that cat story smells
like a pile of excreta. Now prepare to be excised like
the malignant growth you are!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Hey, slow down! I'm not a bad guy, I swear!
I mean, take a look at me—you gotta admit
I've got a serious good-witch vibe going on.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Hmm... I'll grant that you don't resemble a
typical malignancy, but you're also not
anything I've seen before. Yes, of course. Perhaps you're some sort
of benign growth, or even a—

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Okay, let's start here: my name's Ameya.
I'm not sure I know what all those giant
words you just threw out mean, but I
guess I'm technically a 'foreign body.' But I'm not going to do anything
bad, okay? I promise!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
A benign Ameya growth? How fascinating!
Yes, well, while benignancies are not subject
to excision, if this is an attempt at deception,
you will pay for it in blood and bile!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I am Byaku, a priest that protects
the integrity of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, cool! Then you probably
know where I can find my cat.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Ah, yes. While there are tales of cats appearing in the Kosmos to serve as divine messengers, I do not find these stories credible, for I have never seen any such thing myself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
That said, you clearly appear set on searching
for this cat no matter what I say. I am willing to
aid you in this, but as I am in the midst of my
rounds, it must wait until I complete them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Thanks, Byaku! Uh, so how long
will these rounds of yours take?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, not too terribly long... Though things
would go faster if you were willing to help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Sure! We can look for
my cat on the way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Excellent! Now then, my rounds often take me
to dangerous places. As my forte is defense,
I would be pleased if you could assume a more
offensive role.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: You WANT me to fight? Cool!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Our first destination is over there,
so let us be off. Locomotion, ho!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_00.text:
This is the Digestica, one of our four great
temples. At this holy site, substances from
the outer worlds are processed and broken
down to provide energy to the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Oh, wow, something's actually moving
inside there—and going by the name,
I assume it's digesting something?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Defending these temples is the primary
duty for those in the Order of Leukos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Is the Digestica supposed to be this
color? 'Cause it looks a bit...sickly.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Yes, I noticed this as well; an abnormality
seems to have emerged for some reason.
We will need to investigate at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_05.text: Oh, hey! What's that over there?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_000_06.text:
A foreign body—and the malignant kind!
You must excise it at once!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_00.text:
The malignancies that infiltrate the body
hide in all manner of places, and seek nothing
less than the destruction of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_01.text:
That malignancy or whatever is gone,
but the Digestica still looks sick.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Which means the source of the anomaly
must lie elsewhere. Do you see anything
else that seems unusual, Ameya?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_010_03.text:
I mean, I'm no expert or anything,
but the clumps stuck to the pillar-ish
things over there look pretty gnarly.
What even are those, anyway?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_00.text:
Ah, yes! Those are fat globules. While the Kosmos
requires them to function, I doubt the Digestica
would be able to process so many at once.
This may indeed be the anomaly we seek.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_01.text:
Too much of anything always
seems to be bad for you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_02.text:
We must destroy the fats. Let us break them
into smaller pieces so they will be easier for
the Digestica to process and unload.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_000_CUT_020_03.text:
All right, I think I'm following you.
I'll see what I can figure out.

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
To think that malignancies have infested
even this most sacred of lands...
We must be ever vigilant!

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
I'm just glad I was able to break
'em down with magic instead of
the alternative. Brrr...

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATCELLXX_010_CUT_000_.text:
That was the last of the fats.
If we repair the Digestica now,
it should resume its normal function.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay, your rounds are done—great job
all around. Now, let's find that kitty!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Done? By the Kosmos, no!
Now we head to the other temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_00.text:
The flow in this passage has been restored.
We can use it to reach our destination.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Oh, this tube thing is sproingy!
Wheee! This is fun!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_VEINS07_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Focus, Ameya! ...Also, jumping is
not permitted near the entrance.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_VEINS07_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Man, what's with all the giant drops
of liquid flowing through this tube?
Sure doesn't make for an easy walk!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the Respiquary—the temple that
controls the atmosphere of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
This one doesn't seem to
be feeling too hot either.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_020.text: Byaku! How are you today, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, that's Blan, one of the junior priests.
He's been assigned to the Respiquary guard.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Um, there's a really strong wind blowing
out of your temple. Does that not count
as an anomaly?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Of course there's a wind blowing out of it!
Do you not remember me telling you how
the Respiquary controls the atmosphere?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Is that weird foreign body
bothering you, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Do we really have to do this again?
Yes, I'm a foreign body, but it's not
nice to call foreigners 'weird.'
Also, me and Byaku are tight.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_100.text:
This is Ameya. Please treat her as
you would any of my subordinates.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I'm just helping with your rounds,
Byaku. I'm not your blob-cop cadet.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_120.text: Also, now that you mention it, the wind is blowing a bit more strongly than usual. I wonder what that's about.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Bwah! I'm getting blown
right off my feet!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_000.text: Okay, no way is this normal!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_010.text: Anomaly, sir! We have an anomaly!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
We must investigate this at once.
To the Respiquary!

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_WIND_STORM01_000_CUT_0.text:
The wind's too strong for us to come
at the Respiquary from this direction.
We need to go roundabout on this thing!

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_WIND_STORM03_000_CUT_0.text:
Blast! The wind's too strong to
approach it from this direction.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary's condition is irregular.
It must be repaired at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_000_030.text: It must have blown in on the wind.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_010_000.text:
Let us repair the Respiquary at once.
Give us a hand, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_000.text:
We merely slapped a bandage over the problem,
but that should keep it working for a while.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_020.text:
Those born into the priesthood have a sacred
duty to protect the Kosmos, and have been
blessed with the power to repair the temples. One could say we are the chosen elite,
beings selected by the very Kosmos itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_030.text:
Thank you for the assistance, sir!
I can take it from here!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_010_CUT_020_040.text:
Good, because I must return to my rounds—
and between the events at the Digestica
and this, I fear some evil is afoot.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
No idea what THAT is, but I'm guessing
that's not how it's supposed to look.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Cognitheon—the center of the Kosmos,
and the place that controls all other holy sites.
As I feared, there is an anomaly here. We must find and excise it with all speed,
for if the Cognitheon were to shut down
the entire Kosmos would descend into chaos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Feels like the kind of thing
that should have a watchman.
Er, or a watch...blob.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
It should be guarded by a contemporary
of mine in the Order named Safed,
but I do not see him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, since he's not here, I suppose
you'll have to fix it. Also might wanna
hurry, judging by the sound.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Indeed. Whatever this anomaly is, it appears
to have severed the Cognitheon's connection
to the circuits which supply its power.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh dear. I have never seen such a thing.
I'm not even sure how to approach this...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Well, when I don't have a plan, I follow
a hunch—and as a witch, I like to think
my hunches are way better than most.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
So these pointy things around the temple
are circuits, right? But those ones over
there are different from these.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_000.text:
While a small amount of electricity
is flowing over there, its range is
insufficient to reach the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_010.text:
We need to get the electricity flowing
to the Cognitheon, so let's just connect
the circuits to each other all the way
to the temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_000_CUT_010_020.text: Interesting. Yes, that just might work.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
We should connect this circuit
to the one next to it.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
A fine idea. But first, we must excise
the malignancies in the area.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Okay, we're all ready to go.
Let's do this thing!

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONHEALTHY_ALONE0_0.text:
Not all of the circuits are operating.
Select the ones that electricity seems
able to flow through, then link them.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE1A_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE1A_000.text:
Aw, boo! No juice. Seem like this circuit's
just no good—but I'm gonna try again!

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE1B_000.text:
Yes! We've got power! Now we just keep
linking 'em all the way to the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE2A_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE2A_000.text:
Aw, boo! No juice. Seem like this circuit's
just no good—but I'm gonna try again!

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE3A_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE3A_000.text:
Aw, boo! No juice. Seem like this circuit's
just no good—but I'm gonna try again!

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_ALONE3B_000.text:
All right, we have electricity flowing all
the way to the Cognitheon. Now to restore
power to the main part itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_005_CUT_000_000.text:
Let's connect the circuits to each other
until we get the electricity flowing all
the way to the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Great! Then I'll take care
of these malignancies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_010.text: Only because I had your help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Oh hey, looks like there's somebody
on the ground over there!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_050.text:
Heavens, man! You're hurt!
What happened to you!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_070.text:
I'm sorry... I failed to defend the Cognitheon,
and now...I'm done for... I leave this place...
in your hands...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_090.text:
A malignancy must've got him...
Oh, Byaku. I'm so sorry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_100.text:
Safed was the most powerful member of the
priesthood; no mere malignancy could have
ever laid him so low.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_010_CUT_010_130.text:
Ameya, we must hurry
to the next temple.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This looks even worse than the others.
I mean, it isn't moving at ALL!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The Circuleum has completely stopped!
If we don't do something, all activity
in the Kosmos will soon cease—but I
have absolutely no idea WHAT to do!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, I do! When something stops working,
the best thing to do is smack the hell out
of it until it starts up again!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_030.text:
But I know this temple's real important
to you, so I don't want to risk getting
it all scuffed up with my magic... Oh, I know! If there was ever a time to
throw ourselves at problem, this is it!
Let's TACKLE this thing awake!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_040.text:
That sounds like a rather fanciful idea,
but even a thin hope is better than none.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_000_CUT_000_050.text:
I'm gonna need your strength
on this too, Byaku, so let's go!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_DASH_ATTACK_POS1.text:
Okay! We'll start here, build up force,
and then slam right into the Circuleum!

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh man, this thing isn't waking up!
Maybe we didn't hit it hard enough?
We might need to start from farther away.

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_000_CUT_000_.text: Curses! The malignancies have found us!

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yaaay! We did it, Byaku!
The Circuleum is moving again!

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_010_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text:
Oof, that may have been a little TOO hard.
But hey, the Circuleum is moving again,
so let's call it a win.

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_HEART_HIT_020_CUT_000_.text: Good. Now stand back while I mend it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_000.text: Fine work on your rounds today, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_020.text:
Ooo, a high priest? That's gotta be
Byaku's blob-cop captain!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_030.text:
May I ask where you've been, Your Eminence?
I thought the Circuleum was your post.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_040.text:
I had urgent business elsewhere.
How are the other temples looking?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_050.text:
There were anomalies in all of them.
We took emergency measures in each case,
but the situation remains terribly unstable.
And I fear there is even worse news...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_060.text:
Safed is dead. Murdered in cold blood
by an unknown assailant.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_070.text: Mmm. I'm sorry to hear it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_090.text: May I ask a question, sir?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_110.text:
Why did you try to destroy the temples?
And why did you take Safed's life!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_130.text:
That is a dangerous accusation to be
bandying about without proof, Byaku.
Most dangerous indeed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_140.text:
But I do have proof, Your Eminence.
For while malignancies caused the anomalies
at the temples, it is obvious the damage
was inflicted with great purpose.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_150.text:
Additionally, Safed's wounds were
clearly not the work of a malignancy,
but of a fellow priest.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_160.text:
And the only one who would have had the
opportunity to lay him low was you,
High Priest Valkoinen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_170.text:
Hmph! A fine deduction, Byaku. But what you
fail to grasp is that all I have done was in
accordance with the will of the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_180.text: How can you possibly claim such!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_190.text:
...A malignancy? By the Kosmos!
The high priest has become malignant!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_010_200.text:
And now, Byaku, it is the will of the
Kosmos that you join Safed in death.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_000.text:
The Kosmos has begun to initiate its own
ruination. Now let us see if you can resist
when your new destiny is bestowed upon
you by the universe itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_010.text:
Hey, so can someone please tell me
what's happening here in, like,
non-supervillain terms?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_020.text:
I've never heard of a benignancy turning into
a malignancy, nor of the Kosmos initiating its
own ruination. But I also cannot dismiss such
claims as mere tomfoolery.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_030.text:
Ameya, my rounds are now finished.
I am deeply grateful for your help,
and sorry to have imposed upon you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_040.text:
Wait, but what are you going to do, Byaku?
I mean, 'cause I get just enough about what's
happening to know it's only getting started.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_050.text:
Maintaining peace within the Kosmos is my
sacred duty. Even if I must do it alone,
I will never cease my vigil.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_060.text:
Well, we've come this far, so there's
no way I'm gonna abandon you now!
Also, we still haven't found my cat.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_080.text:
Are you certain? Though I cannot begin
to imagine what will happen next, I fear
you will be placing your life in danger.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_090.text:
A witch's word is her bond!
Now where to next?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_010_CUT_020_100.text:
We go to the place where priests are
born in search of further information.

SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_000_CUT_00.text:
Looks like I could leave
this world through here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Behold Thymus, the place from which we
priests hail. Most of the benignancies
that live in the Kosmos were born here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
As many benignancies still live here now,
one may know more about what's happening.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Seems sorta deserted for a place where
many benigna-whatevers live.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Yes, something is very wrong here,
Ameya. Be careful.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Malignancies... And so many!
How did they manage to break in here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
They didn't break in, Byaku—these are
good guys who've gone bad like your
high-priest-blob captain!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_000.text: What can this mean? Could there possibly be an abnormality within the Kosmos itself?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Stay on your...uh, toes? We've got
one over there that's still alive!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_020.text:
No, wait! I'm not malignant!
Are you two still normal?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
You're a priest, right? Thank the Kosmos!
Not sure about the weird growth standing
next to you there, but...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_060.text: You there. You're a carrier, yes?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Skittish cowards who run about dodging
malignancies as they transport things
from one place to another.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_090.text:
Oh, that's charming, especially coming from the
mouth of someone whose high priest was just killed.
Also, if you two are all that stands between chaos
and the Kosmos, I think we're all screwed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_110.text:
Guys, let's please not fight, okay?
What's your name, Carrier?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_130.text:
Well, like I said, I'm Ameya, and this
is Byaku from the Order of...something.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_140.text:
Do you even know what you were fighting
when you battled those malignancies earlier?
They used to be benign!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_150.text:
Oh, we are very much aware; when the
high priest turned malignant earlier,
we were forced to end his life.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_170.text:
It would seem they all began to change after
hearing a divine message from the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_180.text:
The high priest also told us that the Kosmos
had initiated its own ruination. Do you know
anything about that, Carrier?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_190.text: No, but it wouldn't surprise me if the Kosmos decided to destroy itself. I mean, just take a look around. Things are bad.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_200.text: Wait, hang on. You're saying the Kosmos is what turned everyone into bad guys, and that it's now destroying itself?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_210.text:
Pretty much—but I'm not sure the Kosmos
actually knows that's what it's doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_230.text:
The carrier is suggesting that someone has
interfered with the sacred will of the Kosmos
and is now pulling the strings, as it were.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_240.text:
So the will of the Kosmos—which is basically
the will of the whole universe—has been...
possessed by something? What could even
DO something like that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_260.text:
The legendary malignancy that deceived God,
took control of the masses, and destroyed
the world? That's a fairy tale for zygotes!
Canker doesn't actually exist!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_270.text:
Ah, but all folklore has foundation in fact.
Why can't it actually be a real event
that occurred in the long-distant past?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_280.text:
If we assume for the moment that you are
correct, I suppose the return of Canker would
be enough to explain these abnormalities...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_290.text:
Well, great! We just go kill this Canker
guy and everything'll be fine!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_300.text:
You do not understand. Canker is immortal.
If he truly has returned to this world,
there is nothing we can do to stop him.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_310.text:
Actually, there might be one way—although
it would involve a priest like you working
very closely with a carrier like me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_320.text:
Absurd! No priest would ever join forces
with a mere carrier!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_330.text:
Figured you'd say that. Well, good luck
handling things by yourself, then!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_340.text:
W-wait! It is my sworn duty to protect this world.
So for the sake of that duty, I will—just this
once—debase myself to a level where I cooperate
with your lowly self.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_350.text:
No. Please. Stop. I can't take
so much flattery all at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_360.text:
Anyway, I'll take that as a yes and go on
ahead. When you're ready, come outside
so I can explain the details.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_370.text: So do you think this Erytheia blob is legit, Byaku? I mean, it's cool that she knows so much, but then I start wondering how she knows so much? I dunno, maybe I'm just being paranoid.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_000_CUT_010_380.text:
Oh, I trust her like I trust a cyst.
Sadly, we have no other leads—but the
moment she does anything strange,
you know what to do.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Do you understand what this clump is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
This is one of Canker's roots. He uses these
to suck the life force of the Kosmos from its
temples, which is what allows him to grow.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Wait... Something's amiss at the temples!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Because of Canker, the balance of the
entire Kosmos has begun to collapse.
We don't have much time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text: Okay, so what do we do?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Holy powers that have been sealed within
the four great temples—ones said to be
effective against even the power of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Also, I find it very odd that you—a priest—
are unaware of this. I thought it was a secret
that was passed down through your order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Not nearly as odd as the fact that it's
known by a base carrier such as yourself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Transmitting info is a carrier's job;
we tend to pick up whispers along the way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, well, how do you intend to use these
antibodies against Canker when we don't
even know where the creature is?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Easy! We pump 'em into his roots
at the sides of the temples.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, so we turn his own roots
against him? Clever!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
You two can choose which temple to start with,
but we need to do this thing fast.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, and one more thing: we need the power
of prayer to unseal the antibodies,
which is where Byaku comes in.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_040.text:
That's the voice of the Circuleum.
It's controlling Byaku now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_050.text: Why do you seek this power?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Now let's pump this
junk into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_HEART_010_CUT_0.text:
Wooo! Okay then, let's
go to the next temple!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_00.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_03.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_04.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Digestica speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_05.text:
Display to me thine wisdom so I might
deem you worthy of my antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_06.text:
Oh, sweet! I've always been
pretty good at pop quizzes.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Full is truth, and hungry is false.
Full, hungry, full, hungry expresses 10.
You supplicants must now express 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_08.text:
I think it wants us to figure out what
combination of the words 'full' and 'hungry'
will combine to express the number 100.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_09.text:
Uh, weird? But sure, why not.
So if full, hungry, full, hungry is 10,
then 100 would be...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_12.text: Full, full, hungry, hungry, full, hungry, hungry!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_15.text:
Yeah, I sorta had a
feeling that wasn't it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_17.text:
O ye who are bereft of wisdom,
show me instead thine might!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_18.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_18.text: Now THAT'S where I really excel!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_20.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_20.text:
Yesss! Nailed it! I mean,
I sorta lucked out, but whatever!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_22.text:
Thy request is granted.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_000_23.text:
Now let's pump this
junk into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_01.text:
Your might is impressive, supplicant.
The antibodies are yours.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_020_CUT_010_02.text:
Now let's pump this
junk into the root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_STOMACH_010_CUT.text:
Wooo! Okay then, let's
go to the next temple!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I am sorry, Blan, but those who have become
malignancies can never again be benign.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Y-yes, of course... Forgive me, sir.
I...I won't cause you any trouble.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_040.text: Blan, no! What are you doing!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, man... Can't believe he
ended his own life like that.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Respiquary speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Now let's bring this
stuff to Canker's root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.text:
The malignancies will get in the way.
Deal with them first!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_LUNGS_010_CUT_0.text:
Wooo! Okay then, let's
go to the next temple!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_010.text:
That's not Safed anymore, Byaku—
it's a malignancy. I'm sorry,
but Safed is gone.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, poor Safed. He deserves to be at peace.
Might I ask you to grant him that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_000.text:
It's time to extract the antibodies.
Get to praying, Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_030.text:
O ye who seek the antibodies...
I am the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_040.text:
We're now hearing the voice of the
Cognitheon speaking through Byaku.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_050.text: To ye I bestow the antibodies.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Now let's bring this stuff
to Canker's root!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.text:
I'll pump the antibodies
into Canker's root...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_BRAIN_010_CUT_0.text:
Wooo! Okay then, let's
go to the next temple!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text: I no longer sense the presence of Canker.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_CANCER_BRAIN_020_CUT_0.text:
Wait, something isn't right...
Look over there!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
It's gotten sick again!
Man, NOW what do we do?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
And something is emerging
from the temple!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Canker!? But we defeated him!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
He's metastasized; his physical form
has already found refuge here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: But we're all out of antibodies!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Yes, but the antibodies have weakened him;
you should be able to destroy him now.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Well, I sure like the sound of that.
Let's show this creep what Ameya
the Witch can do!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Okay, so NOW it's over, right?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: No. It's not.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
But I killed Canker! I mean, look!
His corpse is right here!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Oh, he's dead all right...for the moment.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: What do you mean, 'for the moment'?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Canker is an immortal malignancy that
always returns to life eventually.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Wait, so all of that was for nothing?
We're just gonna roll over and die?
Is that what you're saying?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
No. I'm saying that this corpse needs
to be removed from the Kosmos so it
can never return again.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Madness! If we leave the Kosmos, we may never
be able to return! And even if we wanted to
take the risk, how can we possibly transport
so large a corpse!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
You? You won't do anything.
But me? Well, I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Oh no, Erytheia...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Needless to say, this will be my final task.
I'll head out right away.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Carri... Nay, Erytheia. Thank you.
And please know that I am sorry.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
What's gotten into you, Byaku?
This isn't like you at all.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text:
Thanks for all your help, Ameya.
Be well...and goodbye.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_ORGAN_LAST_PART_000_CU.text: Good luck, Erytheia.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_01.text:
I guess this is goodbye,
huh, Byaku?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_02.text:
A part of me wishes I could go with you,
but alas, my priestly duties require me
to remain here and protect the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_03.text:
And I know that the Kosmos will be fine
so long as you're here to protect it!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_010_CUT_000_04.text:
How I pray that is true. For my part, I know you will use the power of
the cat you found to protect something you hold
most dear. And as a fellow guardian, I wish you
great success in that duty.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_010_00.text:
Anything unusual... Well, I suppose
these weird things growing all around
us would count, right?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_00.text:
Those are the mucolisks. It is their duty to absorb
things which have been drawn into the Kosmos
and transport them to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_01.text:
Ooof. Those mucolisks over there
don't look healthy at ALL.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_02.text:
Yes, something certainly seems to be amiss.
Perhaps they have been overloaded by excessive
activity? This would also explain why the
Digestica is in such poor condition.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_03.text:
Oh, I TOTALLY get that. You can't devote
yourself to everything all at once, so if
you don't put limits on yourself, you just
end up ruining everything! Anyway, what do we do?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_020_04.text:
Fortunately, some of the mucolisks seem to
be functioning normally. Let us attempt to
harvest a bit of healthy mucus from them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_00.text:
The ones that don't look sickly are the good
ones, right? So we gather mucus from those—
which, ew, by the way—and then...what?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_01.text:
We culture the harvested mucus in the Digestica,
which will send it back out to the mucolisks.
Absorbing this new healthy mucus should bring
them back to their normal selves.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_02.text: Got it! Let's go gather some goo!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_03.text:
Just watch for the overloaded mucolisks!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_100_CUT_030_04.text:
They can absorb living things?
Oh man, I sure hope my poor
kitty didn't come this way!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_105_CUT_000_00.text:
Go harvest mucus from the functioning mucolisks,
but watch out for the overloaded ones!
They'll absorb you if you get too close.

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: This is the last of them, right?

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: We should have enough mucus now.

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_DAMAGE_PILLAR_010_CUT_.text: Then let's head back to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_110_CUT_000_00.text:
Now the power of the Digestica will cultivate
the mucus and send it out to the mucolisks.
That should be enough to restore them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_00.text:
Hey, neat! The Digestica looks better,
and the mucolisks don't seem so overloaded!
But hey, how'd those things even get that
way in the first place?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_01.text:
I imagine they were reacting to an excessive—
and unknown—stimulus. We will need to perform
a full investigation at a later time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_STOMACH_110_CUT_010_02.text: For now, we continue our rounds.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_000.text:
The Respiquary is the temple that regulates
the atmosphere of the Kosmos. We should find
my subordinate Blan somewhere around here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_010.text:
That temple isn't looking
so hot either.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_020.text:
We have a serious problem here, sir!
A malignancy lurks in the alveoli!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm not entirely sure, sir!
Probably one of the unhealthy ones?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
'Alveoli' sounds like a flower or something.
It's probably referring to all of these
plant-like things growing around here.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
Yeah, you can tell just by looking that
something's wrong with the darker ones. 
I bet there's a malignancy in one of 'em.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
Guess I'll just have to look through
all the alveoli until I find it.
Seems easy enough!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Look at this foreign body strolling around
like she owns the place! Should I take her
out with extreme prejudice, sir!?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Easy, Blan. She is my guardian, Ameya—
and while she may be a foreign body,
I trust that her theory is correct.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_105_CUT_000_000.text:
I just have to look through all the
alveoli one by one—a malignancy
HAS to be hiding in one of them.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I don't see any around here.
Any luck with you, Blan?

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It must be closer to the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text: It might be further from the Respiquary.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It has to be somewhere on the side
closer to the Cognitheon.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
It could be somewhere on the side
closer to the Digestica.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Hang on... Oh yeah, I think there's
still a malignancy around here.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Still more snakes in the grass, huh?
Fine by me! We'll just keep at it
until we find 'em all.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
I sense no more malignancies, sir.
I think we excised them all.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_HIDE_ENEMY_000_CUT_000.text:
Then all that's left to do is
restore the Respiquary itself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_000_000.text:
I will revive the Respiquary.
Lend me your aid, Blan.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_000.text: Everything should be fine now, sir!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_010.text: Still, it's unusual for malignancies to attack around the Respiquary instead of simply assaulting it directly.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bran
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_020.text:
It's almost like they're learning, sir!
Which is VERY disturbing!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_LUNGS_110_CUT_010_030.text:
Wow, yikes. Still, we beat 'em,
so how bad could it really be?
Now let's get to the next temple!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_000_000.text:
This temple isn't looking
so hot either.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_000_010.text:
This is the Circuleum—that which maintains the
very life of the Kosmos. It is a temple guarded
by our High Priest Valkoinen himself.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Your Eminence! Are you here!?
It's Byaku, I've come on my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Looks like there's
someone over there!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_010_010.text:
High Priest Valkoinen!
Wh-what happened here?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_010_020.text:
We were attacked by a pack of malignancies.
I'm excising them as fast as I am able,
but there are simply too many to deal with.
You must lend me your aid!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_010_030.text:
It would be my pleasure, Your Eminence.
Get them, Ameya!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_010.text:
You are quite the potent warrior, friend.
But who are you, exactly?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_020.text:
I'm Ameya. Super long story, but the
short version is that I'm protecting
Byaku while he does his rounds.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_030.text:
Is that so? Well, Ameya, I think I could make
use of your particular brand of help.
Will you hear my request?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_050.text:
As you have no doubt observed, there is an
abnormality in the Circuleum. I would like
to stop nibbling around the edges and deal
with the problem at its source.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_060.text:
So those malignancies we just
fought weren't the source?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_020_070.text:
No, the abnormality has a different source.
Look there, if you would.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_000.text: Thymus is enveloped in a wall of fat!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_020.text:
Thymus is the homeland of all
who dwell within the Kosmos.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_030.text:
Every day, new citizens are born in Thymus.
The work they do serves as a major power
source for the Circuleum.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_040.text:
Sadly, the sudden appearance of that wall
is interfering with their activities.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_050.text:
So all your friends are stuck behind
that wall? Then stand back, 'cause
I'm gonna blast it apart with magic!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_060.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_060.text:
Attacking that will not break it.
Try using this instead.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_070.text:
Ewww, it's all soft and...flabby.
Man, everything here is so gross.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_080.text:
Those are mitochondria. If you smear
them clockwise around the entire wall,
that should deal with the matter.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_090.text:
So I just go clockwise around the wall
and that'll make it go away?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_100_CUT_030_100.text:
As I cannot abandon my post,
I'm trusting the two of you to
deal with this in my stead.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_105_CUT_000_000.text:
You will need to circle around the wall
clockwise in order to smear the mitochondria
onto it and release those trapped within.

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text: Ah, excellent! The wall is gone.

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
Wow, it really is gone!
Kinda like magic, actually.

SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_GIMK_AMYA_FATWALLCIRCLE_010_CUT_.text:
We should report our success
to the high priest at once.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_000_000.text:
My thanks for your efforts. The Circuleum
should be up and running again in no time.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_000_010.text:
So, Mr. High Priest, sir? Why exactly
did it have to be clockwise? Was it
all part of some magical incantation?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_000_030.text: Aw, now I REALLY wanna know!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_010_000.text:
If I may, Your Eminence, what made
that wall appear in the first place?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Valkoinen
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_010_010.text:
I don't know. Perhaps it was malignancies—or
perhaps not. Such a thing has not happened before,
and I intend to perform a full investigation.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_HEART_110_CUT_010_020.text:
Then I guess we should pay a
visit to the next temple, huh?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_000.text: Oh man, what a weird shape...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_010.text:
That is the Cognitheon—the command center which
controls the other holy sites. A contemporary
of mine named Safed is in charge of its defense.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, Safed. Any irregularities
here at the Cognitheon?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Something is definitely wrong here:
the electrical flow from the circuits
is unstable, which leaves the Cognitheon
running at a diminished capacity.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Are the circuits those pointy things
that are growing around the temple?
Because they do look sorta messed up.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_000.text:
There's something rather strange
about the circuits over that way.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_010.text:
It's almost like the circuits
are fighting each other...

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_030.text: That is Ameya. She's protecting me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_040.text:
So if we fix those circuits,
it'll solve everything. Right?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Much as I'd love to do that, keeping the
Cognitheon running is a full-time job.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_070.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_070.text:
Do not overstep, Ameya;
you are here strictly to protect me.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_080.text:
Seems like quite a protector!
I know I'd appreciate her help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_090.text:
Hold, Ameya. You won't be able to repair
them alone. I will come with you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_100.text: Figured you were gonna say that.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_110.text: Despite my insistence on accompanying you, I don't actually have the faintest idea how to go about repairing them.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_120.text:
The circuits have been flickering on and off
for a while now. Do you think that has
anything to do with anything?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_130.text:
Of course! The order in which they're flickering
is the way the electricity flows, which means
we should fix them in the same order.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_100_CUT_010_140.text:
Now THAT we can handle!
Let's do it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_105_CUT_000_000.text:
They're flickering in the same order as the
flow of electricity, which means we need to
fix them in the order of the flickers.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.text: Aw, nuts! I totally messed up.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_100_CUT_000.text: Then we start over from the beginning.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_110_CUT_000.text:
Let us return to the Cognitheon
and report our success to Safed.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_000.text:
We're done repairing
the circuits, Mr. Safed!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Wonderful! In that case, the Cognitheon
should return to normal capacity soon.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Except... Oh no! It's being infiltrated
by malignancies! Save it, Ameya!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.speaker: Safed
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_010_000.text:
The Cognitheon has been restored.
Thank you both for your help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_000.text:
I still don't understand why the circuits
failed in the first place, but I suppose
we'll have to accept this as good enough.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_110_CUT_020_010.text: Now then, on with my rounds!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_000.text:
That completes my rounds. You were quite
the big help, Ameya—my sincere apologies
at having kept you for so long.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_010.text:
Aw, it's no big deal—so long
as you help me find my cat.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_020.text:
It is said that within the Kosmos, divine
messengers often take the form of cats.
If I had to guess as to a possible location,
I would suggest you go to the Digestica. Sadly, I'm afraid I have other
business I must attend to.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_060.text: You're a strange one...but I am happy to have the protection.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PATROL_END_CUT_000_080.text: I have business in Thymus. Let us be off!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I had a feeling you'd come once I heard
the news, Byaku. Er, but who's this?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Fair enough. Well, I'm Erytheia,
and I'm a carrier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Carriers risk their lives transporting both
objects and information from place to place.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Huh! That's pretty cool. So are we
sending a message or something?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_060.text:
No. We are here to access her vast knowledge.
Erytheia, do you have any insights into this
strange string of recent incidents?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, it's certainly different from the
malignancies' usual routine. It's almost like
they're observing how we go about our work.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_080.text:
So their goal is not to destroy the Kosmos,
but to learn more about it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_090.text:
That tracks with what I've seen.
The question is, why?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedBloodCell
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Halp! Haaalp! A giant foreign body has
appeared outside—one we've never seen!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_000.text: Wow. That is one big malignancy.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
That's not a malignancy—it's a parasite.
I never imagined I'd see one with my
own eye, but here we are.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
I've heard of parasites: they're bothersome
foreign bodies that suck the life from
other, better creatures.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Parasites possess the ability to control
malignancies; I think it's safe to conclude
that all of this is their doing.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_040.text: So what do the parasites want?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_050.text:
Probably to take over the Kosmos—though
I have no idea how they intend to do it.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_THYMUS_100_CUT_010_060.text:
I will never permit that to happen.
Excise them, Ameya!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_HEART_100_CUT.text: Excise them all! Let none survive!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_LUNGS_100_CUT.text:
Your devious schemes end here,
foul parasite!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_BRAIN_100_CUT.text: I will never let you take the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: That should be the last of the parasites.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text: Wait! Something's amiss at the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_PARASITE_LAST_100_CUT_.text:
Looks like another anomaly.
What happened?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_020.text: The Cognitheon is the brain of the Kosmos. If the parasite can establish itself there, it can usurp its will and become the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Perhaps that was the plan all along and
the other parasites were but distractions.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_040.text:
And we completely fell for it.
A massive miscalculation!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_050.text:
The parasite has already begun to fuse!
It's sucking power out of the Cognitheon
in order to strengthen itself!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_060.text:
Okay, there has to be SOMETHING
we can do. Think, Ameya! Think!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_000_070.text:
Wait, look at the circuits over there...
They're still operating—though barely.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_000.text: Those are the circuits we repaired earlier.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_010.text:
Hey, what if we repaired the circuits
again and got electricity flowing back
to the Cognitheon? If that thing was running right,
it could probably protect itself
from the parasites, right?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_020.text: It's certainly worth a try. Er, do you know how to do that?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_030.text:
Oh sure! We just have to repair 'em
in the order they're flickering.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_120_CUT_010_040.text:
We'll only have one chance at this.
Go, Ameya! For the Kosmos!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_000.text:
We just have to repair the circuits
in the order they're flickering.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_125_CUT_000_010.text: We have but one chance! Hurry!

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_120_CUT_000.text:
We don't have enough time to try again,
which means the fight is ON!

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
Your repairs stopped the parasite from
seizing control, and also gave the
Cognitheon the power to fight it off.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_130_CUT_000.text:
That gives us a chance to excise
the parasite for good!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_130_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_000.text:
With the flow of electricity severed,
it will attempt to take over again.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_130_CUT_020_010.text: I need to repair the circuits again!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_000.text: It's stopped moving. Did we kill it?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_010.text:
No, it's still alive. Blast,
but it's a tenacious one!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_131_CUT_010_020.text:
It's down! This gives me time to repair
the circuits right this time.

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_140_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's on the move again!
Get back to the Cognitheon!

SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_DECO_AMYA_NEURONSICK_150_CUT_000.text:
The parasite's been repelled!
Now's our chance!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_000_000.text: Time to finish this for good!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_010.text:
Thank you for everything, Ameya.
We couldn't have done it without you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_020.text: Aw. I'm just glad I could help.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_030.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_030.text:
In the stories of cats being used as divine
messengers, they typically appeared at the
Digestica. If the Kosmos has granted you
its approval, you may find one there.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_BRAIN_140_CUT_010_040.text:
Listen up, Mr. Kosmos! I worked REALLY hard
here, and I'm gonna need more than a maybe—
so make with the cat already!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_00.text: And here is the way out.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_01.text: Well, I guess this is goodbye, huh?

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_02.text: Ameya, wait. Take me with you.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.speaker: Byaku
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_04.text:
Deadly so. In fact, I'm going with you
whether you want me to or not!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_05.text: Ha ha ha! Just take him already.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_06.text:
Hey, I'm happy to keep the team together.
Let's keep up the good work, Byaku!

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_08.speaker: Erytheia
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_TRACHEA_110_CUT_000_08.text:
Goodbye, old friend!
See you again someday.

SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W06_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, my kitty!
I'm so glad you're safe!
